mean_cn: adj. 紫外线的；  n. 紫外线
mean_en: of or using electromagnetic waves that are just shorter than those of violet light in the spectrum and that cannot be seen
word_etyma: ultra超出，超过+violet蓝紫色→ultraviolet紫外线的
sentence: My hat protected me from the dangerous ultraviolet rays.
sentence_trans: 我的帽子保护我免于危险的紫外线。
